extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double capacity
      The maximum amount of fuel the DoubleTank can hold at one time
      static double DEFAULT_CAPACITY
      A constant to hold default capacity used when creating a DoubleTank using default (or no parameter) contructor
      private double level
      The amount of fuel in the DoubleTank

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoubleTank()
      Default no parameter constructor: Sets level to 0.0 and capacity to constant DEFAULT_CAPACITY
      DoubleTank(double capacity)
      One parameter constructor: Sets level to 0.0 and the capacity to a positive number.

      • DoubleTank

        public DoubleTank()
        Default no parameter constructor: Sets level to 0.0 and capacity to constant DEFAULT_CAPACITY

      • DoubleTank

        public DoubleTank(double capacity)
        One parameter constructor: Sets level to 0.0 and the capacity to a positive number.
        Parameters:
        capacity - a double amount of fuel that the DoubleTank can hold.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the @param capacity is less than or equal to zero.
